meaningMnemonic: When you write your <kanji>name</kanji> for a <kanji>government office</kanji>, they require you to write out your <vocabulary>signature</vocabulary>. Printing won't do for official government office business.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
